org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode
接口 DataNodeMXBean

所有已知实现类：
DataNode
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface DataNodeMXBean

This is the JMX management interface for data node information

方法摘要
 java.lang.String getHttpPort()
          Gets the http port.
 java.lang.String getNamenodeAddress()
          Gets the namenode IP address.
 java.lang.String getRpcPort()
          Gets the rpc port.
 java.lang.String getVersion()
          Gets the version of Hadoop.
 java.lang.String getVolumeInfo()
          Gets the information of each volume on the Datanode.
 

方法详细信息

getVersion

java.lang.String getVersion()
Gets the version of Hadoop.

返回：
the version of Hadoop

getRpcPort

java.lang.String getRpcPort()
Gets the rpc port.

返回：
the rpc port

getHttpPort

java.lang.String getHttpPort()
Gets the http port.

返回：
the http port

getNamenodeAddress

java.lang.String getNamenodeAddress()
Gets the namenode IP address.

返回：
the namenode IP address

getVolumeInfo

java.lang.String getVolumeInfo()
Gets the information of each volume on the Datanode. Please see the implementation for the format of returned information.

返回：
the volume info
